com.impetus.action

Class Forgot_passwordAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.impetus.action.Forgot_passwordAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable

    public class Forgot_passwordAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
    The Class Forgot_passwordAction.The Forgot_passwordAction is a Action class that provides attributes and method to send password on registered email id. It extends ActionSupport in order to provide Action support messages.
    Author:
    Prachi.Singh
    See Also:

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute()
        Execute() method of Forgot_passwordAction class. this method is used to to send password on registered email id. calss compare method of Forgot_passwordManager class to check if email id is registered or not.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action
        Overrides:
        execute in class com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
        Returns:
        SUCCESS if email is dispatched
